notesStmt.note: A fragment: "Known only from 4 leaves, being leaves 2, 3, 6, and 7 of quire a."--Duff.
Title from STC 17073; imprint from STC.
a6v line 1 of heading ends: "yeftes of".
"These leaves, in which the text varies considerably from that of the corresponding leaves of [STC 17073], are more probably cancelled leaves than part of a separate edition."--Duff.
Print show-through and pages torn and stained, affecting legibility.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
